"Our team is using multiple AI tools, but we are slower than ever."

I'm hearing this every week in my conversations with leaders and top teams.

The problem isn't your team or your strategyâ€”it's that disconnected AI tools can't deliver the intelligence you need.

I sat down with my team to share real AI workflows that we use everyday at ClickUp, and we've packaged all the insights into the ultimate AI transformation roadmap that includes:
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png>

 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
AI Sprawl assessment guide

Get the resources <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/N_xtCO5ABUl4JMQujFwhGztSh?domain=links.clickup.com>
